title: Boxing Day turkey salad
ingredients: ['500g (1 1/4 lb) cubed, cooked turkey', '250g (8 oz) mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon paprika', '150g (5 oz) dried cranberries', '1 large stalk celery, chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, minced', '75g (3 oz) chopped pecans', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
